basic.description:
A survey of Italian literature, through selected texts of representative authors, from the eighteenth century to present.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: Survey of Italian Literature II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    Level 2 or perm of the Dept. of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from LLCU234; ITLN234; ITLN332.
Equivalency    ITLN234.
